Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian early patterned or Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; exterior glazed streaky black; edge and underside of foot reserved; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: The early patterned and Wild Goat Style chalices have a heavy and low conical foot. The foot is covered in a black slip on the exterior and reserved on the underside. The bowl, when preserved, is coated in black slip with no decoration.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0321) (phase 2)
